comment.author: 102524903@N04
comment._content: This is in Magadi, Kenya, facing west-north-west over Lake Magadi. This 'compound' may have developed into the present-day square of shops in the middle of town. Here is a view from fall 2010 which was probably taken a few tens of meters further north: www.flickr.com/photos/102524903@N04/9842880683/ , and here is a view of more of the present-day housing, with the town square out of view to the left: www.flickr.com/photos/102524903@N04/9842778784/
